info.description: The Ticketmaster Discovery API allows you to search for events, attractions, or venues.
info.title: Discovery API

get.description: Find attractions (artists, sports, packages, plays and so on) and filter your search by name, and much more.

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sorting order of the search result. Allowable Values : 'name,asc', 'name,desc', 'relevance,asc', 'relevance,desc'

parameters.name: classificationName
parameters.description: Filter attractions by classification name: name of any segment, genre, sub-genre, type, sub-type

parameters.name: classificationId
parameters.description: Filter attractions by classification id: id of any segment, genre, sub-genre, type, sub-type

parameters.name: keyword
parameters.description: Keyword to search on

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Filter entities by its id

parameters.name: source
parameters.description: Filter entities by its source name

parameters.name: includeTest
parameters.description: True if you want to have entities flag as test in the response. Only, if you only wanted test entities

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Page number

parameters.name: size
parameters.description: Page size of the response

parameters.name: locale
parameters.description: The locale in ISO code format. Multiple comma-separated values can be provided. When omitting the country part of the code (e.g. only 'en' or 'fr') then the first matching locale is used.

parameters.name: includeLicensedContent
parameters.description: Yes if you want to display licensed content

parameters.name: includeSpellcheck
parameters.description: yes, to include spell check suggestions in the response.

parameters.name: autocorrect
parameters.description: yes, to re-execute the query based on the best spellcheck suggestion

get.description: Get details for a specific attraction using the unique identifier for the attraction.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the attraction

parameters.name: locale
parameters.description: The locale in ISO code format. Multiple comma-separated values can be provided. When omitting the country part of the code (e.g. only 'en' or 'fr') then the first matching locale is used.

parameters.name: includeLicensedContent
parameters.description: True if you want to display licensed content

parameters.name: page

parameters.name: locale

parameters.name: includeLicensedContent

parameters.name: includeSpellcheck

get.description: Get details for a specific segment, genre, or sub-genre using its unique identifier.

get.description: Find events and filter your search by location, date, availability, and much more.

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sorting order of the search result. Allowable values : 'name,asc', 'name,desc', 'date,asc', 'date,desc', 'relevance,asc', 'relevance,desc', 'distance,asc', 'name,date,asc', 'name,date,desc', 'date,name,asc', 'date,name,desc','onsaleStartDate,asc', 'id,asc'

parameters.name: startDateTime
parameters.description: Filter events with a start date after this date

parameters.name: endDateTime
parameters.description: Filter events with a start date before this date

parameters.name: onsaleStartDateTime
parameters.description: Filter events with onsale start date after this date

parameters.name: onsaleOnStartDate
parameters.description: Filter events with onsale start date on this date

parameters.name: onsaleOnAfterStartDate
parameters.description: Filter events with onsale range within this date

parameters.name: onsaleEndDateTime
parameters.description: Filter events with onsale end date before this date

parameters.name: city
parameters.description: Filter events by city

parameters.name: countryCode
parameters.description: Filter events by country code

parameters.name: stateCode
parameters.description: Filter events by state code

parameters.name: postalCode
parameters.description: Filter events by postal code / zipcode

parameters.name: venueId
parameters.description: Filter events by venue id

parameters.name: attractionId
parameters.description: Filter events by attraction id

parameters.name: segmentId
parameters.description: Filter events by segment id

parameters.name: segmentName
parameters.description: Filter events by segment name

parameters.name: classificationName
parameters.description: Filter events by classification name: name of any segment, genre, sub-genre, type, sub-type

parameters.name: classificationId
parameters.description: Filter events by classification id: id of any segment, genre, sub-genre, type, sub-type

parameters.name: marketId
parameters.description: Filter events by market id

parameters.name: promoterId
parameters.description: Filter events by promoter id

parameters.name: dmaId
parameters.description: Filter events by dma id

parameters.name: includeTBA
parameters.description: True, to include events with date to be announce (TBA)
parameters.default: no if date parameter sent, yes otherwise

parameters.name: includeTBD
parameters.description: True, to include event with a date to be defined (TBD)
parameters.default: no if date parameter sent, yes otherwise

parameters.name: clientVisibility
parameters.description: Filter events by clientName

parameters.name: nlp
parameters.description: Semantic search events with nlp(experimental)

parameters.name: latlong
parameters.description: Filter events by latitude and longitude, this filter is deprecated and maybe removed in a future release, please use geoPoint instead

parameters.name: radius
parameters.description: Radius of the area in which we want to search for events.

parameters.name: unit
parameters.description: Unit of the radius

parameters.name: geoPoint
parameters.description: filter events by geoHash

parameters.name: keyword
parameters.description: Keyword to search on

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Filter entities by its id

parameters.name: source
parameters.description: Filter entities by its source name

parameters.name: includeTest
parameters.description: True if you want to have entities flag as test in the response. Only, if you only wanted test entities

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Page number

parameters.name: size
parameters.description: Page size of the response

parameters.name: locale
parameters.description: The locale in ISO code format. Multiple comma-separated values can be provided. When omitting the country part of the code (e.g. only 'en' or 'fr') then the first matching locale is used.

parameters.name: includeLicensedContent
parameters.description: Yes if you want to display licensed content

parameters.name: includeSpellcheck
parameters.description: yes, to include spell check suggestions in the response.

parameters.name: autocorrect
parameters.description: yes, to re-execute the query based on the best spellcheck suggestion

get.description: Get details for a specific event using the unique identifier for the event. This includes the venue and location, the attraction(s), and the Ticketmaster Website URL for purchasing tickets for the event.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the event

parameters.name: locale
parameters.description: The locale in ISO code format. Multiple comma-separated values can be provided. When omitting the country part of the code (e.g. only 'en' or 'fr') then the first matching locale is used.

parameters.name: includeLicensedContent
parameters.description: True if you want to display licensed content

get.description: Get images for a specific event using the unique identifier for the event.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the event

parameters.name: locale
parameters.description: The locale in ISO code format. Multiple comma-separated values can be provided. When omitting the country part of the code (e.g. only 'en' or 'fr') then the first matching locale is used.

parameters.name: includeLicensedContent
parameters.description: True if you want to display licensed content

get.description: Find search suggestions and filter your suggestions by location, source, etc.

parameters.name: keyword
parameters.description: Keyword to search on

parameters.name: source
parameters.description: Filter entities by its source name

parameters.name: latlong
parameters.description: Filter events by latitude and longitude, this filter is deprecated and maybe removed in a future release, please use geoPoint instead

parameters.name: radius
parameters.description: Radius of the area in which we want to search for events.

parameters.name: unit
parameters.description: Unit of the radius

parameters.name: size
parameters.description: Size of every entity returned in the response

parameters.name: includeFuzzy
parameters.description: yes, to include fuzzy matches in the search. This has performance impact.

parameters.name: clientVisibility
parameters.description: Filter events to clientName

parameters.name: nlp
parameters.description: Semantic search events with nlp(experimental)

parameters.name: countryCode
parameters.description: Filter suggestions by country code

parameters.name: includeTBA
parameters.description: True, to include events with date to be announce (TBA)
parameters.default: no if date parameter sent, yes otherwise

parameters.name: includeTBD
parameters.description: True, to include event with a date to be defined (TBD)
parameters.default: no if date parameter sent, yes otherwise

parameters.name: segmentId
parameters.description: Filter suggestions by segment id

parameters.name: geoPoint
parameters.description: filter events by geoHash

parameters.name: view
parameters.description: Change the fields returned in the response

parameters.name: locale
parameters.description: The locale in ISO code format. Multiple comma-separated values can be provided. When omitting the country part of the code (e.g. only 'en' or 'fr') then the first matching locale is used.

parameters.name: includeLicensedContent
parameters.description: Yes if you want to display licensed content

parameters.name: includeSpellcheck
parameters.description: yes, to include spell check suggestions in the response.

parameters.name: autocorrect
parameters.description: yes, to re-execute the query based on the best spellcheck suggestion

parameters.name: id

parameters.name: includeTest

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Page number

parameters.name: size
parameters.description: Page size of the response

parameters.name: locale
parameters.description: The locale in ISO code format. Multiple comma-separated values can be provided. When omitting the country part of the code (e.g. only 'en' or 'fr') then the first matching locale is used.

parameters.name: includeLicensedContent
parameters.description: Yes if you want to display licensed content

get.description: Get details for a specific venue using the unique identifier for the venue.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the venue

parameters.name: locale
parameters.description: The locale in ISO code format. Multiple comma-separated values can be provided. When omitting the country part of the code (e.g. only 'en' or 'fr') then the first matching locale is used.

parameters.name: includeLicensedContent
parameters.description: True if you want to display licensed content

startApproximate.description: Boolean flag to indicate whether or not the access start date is approximated

endApproximate.description: Boolean flag to indicate whether or not the access end date is approximated

Accessibility.description: Additional information for people who experience disabilities

id.description: Unique id of the entity in the discovery API

locale.description: Locale in which the content is returned

url.description: URL of a web site detail page of the entity

test.description: Indicate if this is a test entity, by default test entities won't appear in discovery API

primary.description: True if this is the entity's primary classification

segment.description: A Segment is a primary genre for an entity (Music, Sports, Arts, etc)

genre.description: Secondary Genre to further describe an entity (Rock, Classical, Animation, etc)

subGenre.description: Tertiary Genre for additional detail when describring an entity (Alternative Rock, Ambient Pop, etc)

type.description: A Type represents a kind or group of people. (Donation, Group, Individual, Merchandise, Event Style, etc)

subType.description: Secondary Type to further categorize an entity (Band, Choir, Chorus, etc)

softLanding.description: True the landing is Soft otherwise it's Comingled

localDate.description: The event end date in local date

localTime.description: The event end time in local time

approximate.description: Boolean flag to indicate whether or not the end date is approximated

noSpecificTime.description: Boolean flag to indicate whether or not the event end time has no specific time

id.description: Unique id of the entity in the discovery API

locale.description: Locale in which the content is returned

url.description: URL of a web site detail page of the entity

info.description: Any information related to the event

pleaseNote.description: Any notes related to the event

accessibility.description: Additional information for people who experience disabilities

place.description: Place has the information on where the event happens. It can be set if there is no venue

test.description: Indicate if this is a test entity, by default test entities won't appear in discovery API

start.description: Event's start dates. The date and time when the event will start

end.description: Event's end dates. The date and time when the event will end

access.description: Event's access dates. The date and time the fan can access the event

spanMultipleDays.description: Flag indicating if date spans of multiple days

id.description: Unique id of the entity in the discovery API

EventImages.description: This class defines an Event with only images view on the Discovery API

public.description: Public onsale information on this event

id.description: An external link id is the unique identifier of a resource on a different domain or api

url.description: An external link url is a url that goes to a different domain or api

id.description: The ID of the classification's level

name.description: The Name of the classification's level

fallback.description: true if the image is not the event's image but a fallbak image

id.description: The ID of the classification's level

name.description: The Name of the classification's level

url.description: Url to the web page of the parking

postalCode.description: Postal code / zipcode of the place

startDateTime.description: Presale's start dates. The date and time when the presale will start

endDateTime.description: Presale's end dates. The date and time when the presale will end

startDateTime.description: Public sale's start dates. The date and time when the public sale will start

endDateTime.description: Public sale's end dates. The date and time when the public sale will end

startTBD.description: True if the public sale's date is to be determined

PublicVisibility.description: The class defines the public visibility period on the Discovery/Publish API.

source.description: The source name of the related entity

id.description: The ID of the related entity

references.description: References of this relationship in another system. Reference is the exact same entity

id.description: The ID of the classification's level

name.description: The Name of the classification's level

localDate.description: The event start date in local date

localTime.description: The event end time in local time

dateTBD.description: Boolean flag to indicate whether or not the start date is TBD

dateTBA.description: Boolean flag to indicate whether or not the start date is TBA

timeTBA.description: Boolean flag to indicate whether or not the start time is TBA

noSpecificTime.description: Boolean flag to indicate whether or not the event start time has no specific time

id.description: Unique id of the entity in the discovery API

locale.description: Locale in which the content is returned

url.description: URL of a web site detail page of the entity

postalCode.description: Postal code / zipcode of the venue

currency.description: Default currency of ticket prices for events in this venue

dma.description: The list of associated DMAs (Designated Market Areas) of the venue

boxOfficeInfo.description: Box office informations for the venue

test.description: Indicate if this is a test entity, by default test entities won't appear in discovery API

acceptedPaymentDetail.description: Venue box office accepted payment details

willCallDetail.description: Venue box office will call details

geolocation.description: Gelocolation extension on a venue | add filter 'extensions=geolocation' on your venues request
